trans-unit.source: Represents an extension that hooks up with compensation activities and persists compensation-related instance state.
trans-unit.target: 代表連結補償活動，並持續發生補償相關之執行個體狀態的延伸模組。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensationExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensationExtension"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Called by the host to collect read-write values and write-only values related to compensation to be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫主應用程式收集讀寫值和唯寫與保存之補償相關的值。

trans-unit.source: The read-write values to be persisted.
The write-only values to be persisted.
Called by the host to pass all of the loaded values related to compensation that were part of the most recent persistence episode.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫主應用程式的所有載入值補償相關的最新的持續性時段中傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The read-write values that were loaded from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 從持續性存放區載入的讀寫值。

trans-unit.source: Returns any additional extensions to compensation activities.
trans-unit.target: 補償活動傳回的任何其他擴充。

trans-unit.source: A collection of additional workflow extensions.
trans-unit.target: 其他工作流程擴充的集合。

trans-unit.source: Sets any additional extensions to compensation activities.
trans-unit.target: 設定補償活動的任何其他擴充。

trans-unit.source: The target workflow instance to set.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定目標工作流程執行個體。
